title: SubstanceDefinition data model based on HL7 equivalent resource
description: Smart Data Models for SubstanceDefinition HL7/FHIR resource type

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/'. This is a SubstanceDefinition resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Meta'. The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/uri'. String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Narrative'. A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/ResourceList'. These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Identifier'. Identifier by which this substance is known.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

version.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/string'. A sequence of Unicode characters

_version.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

classification.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/CodeableConcept'. A high level categorization, e.g. polymer or nucleic acid, or food, chemical, biological, or a lower level such as the general types of polymer (linear or branch chain) or type of impurity (process related or contaminant).

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

domain.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

grade.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/CodeableConcept'. The quality standard, established benchmark, to which substance complies (e.g. USP/NF, Ph. Eur, JP, BP, Company Standard).

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

description.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/markdown'. A string that may contain Github Flavored Markdown syntax for optional processing by a mark down presentation engine

_description.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

note.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Annotation'. Textual comment about the substance's catalogue or registry record.

items.description: A  text note which also  contains information about who made the statement and when.

manufacturer.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Reference'. The entity that creates, makes, produces or fabricates the substance. This is a set of potential manufacturers but is not necessarily comprehensive.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

supplier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Reference'. An entity that is the source for the substance. It may be different from the manufacturer. Supplier is synonymous to a distributor.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.
The detailed description of a substance, typically at a level beyond what is used for prescribing.

property.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/SubstanceDefinition_Property'. General specifications for this substance.

items.description: The detailed description of a substance, typically at a level beyond what is used for prescribing.

molecularWeight.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/SubstanceDefinition_MolecularWeight'. The molecular weight or weight range (for proteins, polymers or nucleic acids).

items.description: The detailed description of a substance, typically at a level beyond what is used for prescribing.

structure.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/SubstanceDefinition_Structure'. The detailed description of a substance, typically at a level beyond what is used for prescribing.

code.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/SubstanceDefinition_Code'. Codes associated with the substance.

items.description: The detailed description of a substance, typically at a level beyond what is used for prescribing.

name.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/SubstanceDefinition_Name'. Names applicable to this substance.

items.description: The detailed description of a substance, typically at a level beyond what is used for prescribing.

relationship.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/SubstanceDefinition_Relationship'. A link between this substance and another, with details of the relationship.

items.description: The detailed description of a substance, typically at a level beyond what is used for prescribing.

sourceMaterial.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/SubstanceDefinition_SourceMaterial'. The detailed description of a substance, typically at a level beyond what is used for prescribing.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'SubstanceDefinition'
